title: Proof that the system is fucked.
body:
My friend got Kindred to lvl 5 with this game. And he got an S and lvl 6 token for the same game.

Does this look like a S score?

This proves how fucked the scoring system is. another friend today went 30/7/19 (or something very similar to that) and didn't even get an S- yet now 2 hours later, another friend 4/6/9 gets an S.

replies.body: If only ranks went purely off kills and assists

Well considering he had only 125 monsters, and 13k at 34:45, not even lvl 16 let alone 18, and therefore can only assume he didn't have much objective control, then this is really not S worthy, no matter how "bad" other Kindreds are. (Which they aren't btw). 

Not saying Lord's friend went bad but this doesn't really qualify for an S rank when his friend went 30/7/19 and didn't get shit.
illoi usually gets S with scores like 8/4/8,

rammus 13/10/16 in one of my games goes s

in another game ashe went 25/7/8 and gragas went 23/7/25 not even an s minus.
Don't worry someone will try to justify this still.
